name: 2022 9th Intl. Conference on Soft Computing & Machine Intelligence
content: Publication: All submissions will be peer reviewed, and all accepted papers will be published in ISCMI 2022 conference proceedings and included into IEEE Xplore, which will be submitted to major databases like EI Compendex ans Scopus for abstracting and indexing. A special issue of "Neural Computing & Applications", a Springer Publication \[SCIE indexed, 2020 lmpact Factor : 5.606, 5 Year Impact Factor : 5.573; ISSN: 0941-0643 (print version) ISSN: 1433-3058 (electronic version)\], will publish a selected set of extended versions of ISCMI21 papers (to be shortlisted after the conference), after the usual reviewing of those papers.
